State.Author: Izayo
State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.
State.Name: IZY-All in One Gun Pack v3.1

State.Author: unv_Annihilator
State.Description:
Previously 'CraftFromContainers' by aedenthorn.



Craft Items, Repair Items, Upgrade Blocks, Repair Blocks, Reload Weapons, Repair Vehicles, Refuel Vehicles, Refuel Generators

From nearby Storage Crates, Player Storage (drawers, fridges, etc.), and/or Vehicles



Fully configurable and compatible with most storage mods!
State.Name: 1.0 Beyond Storage

Original.Name: DIY Helmet Light Mod by GR.zip-6409-1-0-1730055064.zip

State.Author: GoblinRemovalist
State.Description: Adds an alternate recipe for an early game DIY Helmet Light Mod because the almost-mid-game vanilla recipe is ridiculous.

State.Author: AMG5TAG
State.Description: Remove stone tools from the loot table and traders.

State.Description:
1.0 +

Adds a recipe to make a Mega Crush / energy drink.
State.Name: Mega Crush recipe

State.Author: Daddy Jack
State.Description: Add's Craftable steel strength clear glass blocks!
State.Name: Palladium Glass

State.Author: ruriyuyupiyo
State.Description: Change Charred Meat in Loot to Grilled Meat.
State.Name: Replace Charred Meat

State.Author: TheMeanOneMods
State.Description: TheMeanOnes Craftable Candies is a game-changing mod for 7 Days to Die that puts the power in your hands. Tired of relying on random loot drops or hoping to find your favorite candies at a trader? With this mod, you can craft a variety of powerful candies directly at the Chemistry Station.
State.Name: TheMeanOnes Craftable Candies

State.Author: DoubleBlundy
State.Description: Makes the auto shotgun fully automatic and increases the fire rate from 70 to 245.
State.Name: V1.0 Full auto-auto shotgun

State.Author: sphereii
State.Description:
This is a library mod that has many features, configurable in the Config/blocks.xml. 



It is aimed at modders' to include as a dependency to enhance their own mod.



By itself, it does not do much.



Art provided by mumpfy: https://mumpfy.myportfolio.com/
State.Name: 0-SCore

State.Author: Danzo
State.Description: Sound alerts for screamer spawns, when screamers spawn hordes of zombies, and for wandering zombie hordes.
State.Name: 1.0-1.2 Danzo Screamer Alert

State.Author: Izayo
State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.

State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.

State.Author: bdubyah
State.Description:
A collection of my vehicles. Custom mechanic trader. Current as of 1.0.



!!!HAS TO BE INSTALLED ON BOTH SERVERS AND CLIENTS!!!
State.Name: Bdub's Vehicles (1.2)

State.Author: Officecats5
State.Description: 100x100 wilderness tier 4 forest POI for 1.0. deadly mountain trail turned into a mystery. what happened to these people on this camp ground? all the different Biomes create 5 different versions of this POI with it's biome variant plants/trees
State.Name: Cedar Creek

State.Author: ZZTong MPlogue Stallionsden etc
State.Description:
This modlet provides a common definition of custom vanilla blocks that have

previously appeared in multiple modlets. Instead of having each modlet define

the same block with a slightly different name, various POI modlets could

instead share (depend upon) this modlet.



This is a prefabbers toolbox in short.
State.Name: Custom-Blocks-Pack(CBP)

State.Author: FlufferNutterSandwich
State.Description: This mod lowers all heat producers in the game to make screamers spawn roughly 50% less often than vanilla.
State.Name: FNS Less Screamers Please

State.Author: Svarii
State.Description:
Tier 2 POI

Gella Park is an extra small residential park, formerly occupied by transient cannibals.

Quests: Clear, Fetch, Infested.
State.Name: Gella Park

State.Author: Izayo
State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.
State.Name: IZY-All in One Gun Pack v3.1

State.Author: Hellgeist
State.Description: This is a roleplay mod for 1.0/A21 that allows your character to create a stuffed animal companion that can be sewn in or attached to their armor. The nights are cold and lonely, but a little friend can help light the way.
State.Name: Little Buddy

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: This mod adds several new T3 weapons converted from T2 weapons. Keep look, animations and sounds of the T2 weapons but get upgraded stats and new features. Weapon stats are tweaked and tested to make it as balanced as possible, while keeping it fun. IT DOES NOT REPLACE THE VANILLA WEAPONS, but it adds several new weapons instead.
State.Name: LittleRedSonja T2 into T3 grade weapons

State.Author: Michael Logue
State.Description: NOW AVAILABLE FOR 7D2D v1.0....!  Consolidated Mod Pack of all of my Prefabs Converted to v1.0 (42 in total - Two new one's with this release).   This is a Mod - and should be installed in your Appdata Mod Folder.  For Multiplayer, it must be installed both server and client side.  This will require generating a new Random Map.
State.Name: MPLogue's V1.0  Prefabs

State.Author: DW420_AM1908
State.Description:
On Screen Tracking for: 

i) Nearby Entities (Zombies and animals)  

ii)Nearby Custom Waypoints and Traders (NPC)

iii)Player owned properties (bedroll, land claim block etc)
State.Name: On Screen Display 1.0

State.Author: Dreadfeather
State.Description: Refried Sham Sammich - won't make you sick.
State.Name: DFR Refried Sham Sammich (v1.0exp)

State.Author: FREIZE1T
State.Description: A smaller Drawbridge, 1 Block wide and 4 Blocks long. Craftabe at the workbench
State.Name: Small Drawbridge (V1.0)

State.Author: magejosh
State.Description: New Books series for Sledgehammers and tools. Makes combat with tools viable, and makes harvesting with the sledgehammer improve with each book you read in the series. Complete series bonus increases all tool harvesting as well. Adds a new T3 Sledgehammer and a new mod for tools and sledgehammers that applies a burning and shocking debuff.
State.Name: Tool Time

State.Author: CautiousPancake
State.Description: This pack of modlets adds 6 new quests to 7 Days to Die Alpha 21, with the intention of providing additional variety and challenge to the quests offered by the traders.
State.Name: Trader Quest Addendum

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: New mod that gives animals random names!

State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.

State.Description: A 《7 Days to Die》 Simple UI.

Original.Name: CP Modded All In One No Traders-4623-1-2-50-3-1734161392.zip

State.Author: Stallionsden and Compopack team
State.Description: With over 4000 community made pois the Compopack is designed for enriched gameplay and many hours of fun and excitement and thrills of exploring pois of the past and new ones as well. Designed for the player to choose the poi/s that best suit their game the possibilities are endless.
State.Name: Compopack V1 CP Modded

State.Author: Stallionsden and Compopack team
State.Description: With over 4000 community made pois the Compopack is designed for enriched gameplay and many hours of fun and excitement and thrills of exploring pois of the past and new ones as well. Designed for the player to choose the poi/s that best suit their game the possibilities are endless.
State.Name: Compopack V1 CP Modded

State.Description: Allows you to use your own particle prefab for explosion, with script support.
State.Name: Custom Explosion Particle Loader

State.Author: DW420 and AM1908
State.Description:
150+ colours to dye your Cars, Bikes, Bicycles, Drones, Tools, Weapons and Clothes* with.





*When TFP allows it.
State.Name: Dyes Expanded 1.0

State.Author: FlufferNutterSandwich
State.Description: This pack is a collection of all of FlufferNutterSandwich's POIs for 1.0
State.Name: FNS POI Pack 1.0

State.Author: FlufferNutterSandwich
State.Description: This is my second volume of POI Packs.  What differentiates the second volume is that it relies on other community mods as requirements.  The heart and soul of this volume is about getting other community mod authors to include their talent into these POIs so we get varied and fun new experiences.
State.Name: FNS Special Requirements POI Pack

Original.Name: Imagine Better Food - Vanilla Values Plus-5873-1-0-1724358892.zip

State.Author: iSneakyPewPew
State.Description: This mod is a variant of the original Imagine Better Food. This version DOES NOT change the vanilla values of food/water. Airdrop items are still present.
State.Name: Imagine Better Food - Vanilla Values Plus

State.Author: 00LazyTurtle89
State.Description:
This covers all my prefabs into 1 pack. We have 12 pois to go and explore and all of them have quests.



they range from T2 to T5 all with infested.
State.Name: Lazy Poi Pack

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description:
♪♪♪ I'm a Barbie Girl, in a Zombie World...♪♪♪  

In this Fabulous Corvette, unmatched craftsmanship and comfort meets a phenomenal Ultra Performance powertrain. This is the Apocalypse’s finest luxury car.
State.Name: LittleRedSonja Barbie Let's Go Party Car

State.Author: ocbMaurice
State.Description: Adds more waypoint icons, also allows to change icons via xml for other mods. Not EAC compatible.
State.Name: OCB Map Waypoints (V1.2)

State.Author: Double G
State.Description: This is a non-questable POI. It's a cemetery with a very unique feature - the zombies spawn by crawling out of their graves. Up to 40 zombies will spawn simply by walking through the front gate.
State.Name: Resurrection Cemetery

State.Author: Mackenziix
State.Description: 7 Prefabs inspired by the Walking Dead TV Series. Prefabs are created by Mackenziix and updated to the current game version by me.
State.Name: The Walking Dead POI Pack

State.Author: IronSharkInc
State.Description: A 7 Days to Die (7D2D) mod that allows traders to spawn in any biome. To support that changes the way players visit traders and biomes.
State.Name: Unlocked Traders

State.Author: Voltralux
State.Description: This is a compilation of custom made explorable and questable POI locations, currently totalling 26. These POI's range from Tier 1-5, supporting all quest types and are receiving constant support. In addition to dozens of new and varied locations to explore, this pack contains a range of new decorative items to craft and containers to loot.
State.Name: Voltralux's POI Pack (1.0)

State.Author: Stallionsden and Compopack team
State.Description: With over 4000 community made pois the Compopack is designed for enriched gameplay and many hours of fun and excitement and thrills of exploring pois of the past and new ones as well. Designed for the player to choose the poi/s that best suit their game the possibilities are endless.
State.Name: Compopack V1 CP Modded

State.Description: This prefab can be placed but is of mostly decorative value.

State.Description: "Do you eat? Will you go there?"

A simple mod changes the recipe for Molotovs to shale oil instead of machine oil



To support me visit this site  ko-fi.com/igor4ever
State.Name: Molotov Cocktail OilShale

State.Description: A little mod that stops zombies from sticking to the voxel/block grid when pathfinding to the player. UPDATE: Now server-side only!

High performance running shoes as mod.

We will make it possible to attach it to foot armor.

State.Description: This simple modlet brings back the Empty glass jar and makes Jars reusable after drinking drinks!

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: Vehicles now have cruise control. Pressing Q will put them into cruise control and move forward without having to keep the W key pressed

State.Description: Allows you to inflict more Bleed Stacks on enemies for each level in the (Knife Skill) perk Deep Cuts.

State.Description:
Increases the time that loot bags (and animal corpses) remain on the ground.

 Configurable.

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: Very small modlet that allows to rotate player storage and workstations in every possible angle. You can for example place workstations at 45 degrees angle to fit on diagonal walls or horizontally on the floor, or rotate your storage so the label is visible when using them on flooring or ceiling. Your creativity is the only limit.
State.Name: All Rotations for Boxes and Workstations

State.Description:

iii)Player owned properties (bedroll, land claim block etc)

Increases the time that loot bags (and animal corpses) remain on the ground.

 Configurable.

State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.
State.Name: IZY-All in One Gun Pack v3.1

State.Author: redbeardt
State.Description: Do you remember when you first tried to dye armour in v1 and found your dye did nothing? DO YOU??? Welp, this mod.. to the rescue!!
State.Name: Dyable

State.Author: Area88
State.Description: Vehicle horns open or close doors, gates and drawbridges.
State.Name: Horn Opens Doors

State.Author: quentfr21
State.Description: divide the damage the vehicle take by 2 or 5 or 10(depending on the version)
State.Name: Vehicle Damage Reducer for 1.0

State.Author: Svarii
State.Description: Slightly Fire damaged Questable Residential POI with highly detailed interior and exterior, including vents in the walls, working light switches, 3 key racks to find.
State.Name: Clopex Estate

State.Author: Lord_Fribby
State.Description: A modlet that shows the effects of the different armor qualities in the item description.
State.Name: Detailed Armor Descriptions

State.Author: Saminal
State.Description: The trees immediately replant themselves in the same spot after you cut them down.  It also drastically reduces tree seed drop rates, so there is less hassle with inventory management and replanting.
State.Name: FNS Self-Planting Trees

State.Author: Gyropilot
State.Description: Sneak Attack applies while undetected regardless of you being crouched
State.Name: Sneak Attack Standing Up

State.Author: FREIZE1T
State.Description:
NEW VARIANTS! 4, 5 and 6 block wide 3 to 8 block high.

Add to the game an elevator for yourself and your vehicles.
State.Name: Elevator (V1.0)

State.Author: Khaine
State.Description: This mod adds a third input slot to the Forge for smelting.
State.Name: KHV1 3 Slot Forge

State.Author: ocbMaurice
State.Description: Add a Parachute for you to deploy when falling from the sky, making `Oh Shitz Drops` obsolete. Not EAC compatible. Work in Progress.
State.Name: OCB Parachute (V1.2)

State.Author: Creepers152
State.Description: This mod is so that you can have even better loot bags on the blood moon horde night. Because I always thought that the horde nights always had a lack luster loot table. So I made one, and made it so you can only get it on horde night. The exception being Darkness Falls because they have something special that also uses the horde night spawns.
State.Name: Blood Moon Loot Bags

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: Added a collection of 12 figurines portraying the Zombie creatures in game, and a 4 sets of 3 grouped figurines each for more compact decoration. Includes a "Catch them All" mode, find them all and get a nice reward. You can choose between "Craft + Loot" or "Loot Only" modes.
State.Name: LittleRedSonja Bad BoyZ Figurines

State.Author: Phys1csGamez
State.Description: NEW - Now only the fletching feathers of the standard arrows and bolts flash colors as you approach them for easier pickup.
State.Name: PGz Flashy Fletching v1

State.Author: Nocloud4u
State.Description: Set Lever Action Rifle to use .44 Ammo and NOT .762.
State.Name: Cloud's Lever 44

State.Author: Jakmeister999
State.Description: A "Larger Stack" mod that add a more "reasonable" stack sizes to many items that make inventory management still relevant. Also makes a few extra items stackable
State.Name: Jakmeister999's REASONABLE Large Stacks (V1.0)

Original.Name: V1 66 lockable smaller Lock icon white-5021-V1-0-0-3c-1721639810.rar

State.Author: TheEpicSpire
State.Description: Increases the Back Pack to 66 slots
State.Name: V1.0 EpicSpire's 66slot BackPack

State.Author: Alter
State.Description: Pick up planted crops with Living off the Land and Farmer bonuses.

State.Author: napalm1
State.Description: We are not animals, there may be clean water in the tank.
State.Name: Toilet Tanks Discovered

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: Vehicles now trigger pressure plates. You no longer need to get off you bike or car to activate any pressure plates.
State.Name: Vehicles Trigger Pressure Plates - V1.1 b14

State.Author: GoblinRemovalist
State.Description: Reload all Vanilla ranged weapons faster.  As you level with that ranged weapon skill, it gets even faster.
State.Name: Beefy Reload Speeds by GR

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: This mod adds several new T3 weapons converted from T2 weapons. Keep look, animations and sounds of the T2 weapons but get upgraded stats and new features. Weapon stats are tweaked and tested to make it as balanced as possible, while keeping it fun. IT DOES NOT REPLACE THE VANILLA WEAPONS, but it adds several new weapons instead.
State.Name: LittleRedSonja T2 into T3 grade weapons

State.Author: Creepers152
State.Description:
A mod that adds a recipe for Solar Cells up to level 5 and adds a recipe for Solar Bank. This mod also modifies the power generated from Solar Power. The Solar Bank can now output a max of 360w now.

The Solar Cells generate:

MK 1 = 34w

MK 2 = 40w

MK 3 = 45w

MK 4 = 50w

MK 5 = 54w

MK 6 = 60w
State.Name: Solar Powered

State.Author: Nightmare Moonpie
State.Description: Adds a set of seven perk books affecting knives.
State.Name: Knife Perk Books

State.Author: ocbMaurice
State.Description: New powered block to remotely control (powered) turrets and show their camera stream on the control panel's monitor (CCTV). Not EAC compatible!
State.Name: OCB Remote Turret Control CCTV (V1.2)

State.Author: Svarii
State.Description: You are being watched
State.Name: WatchTower 7

State.Author: BlackRabbitMsk
State.Description: Upgrade Basic Ammo
State.Name: Z Upgrade Basic Ammo

State.Description: Vehicle horns open or close doors, gates and drawbridges.

State.Author: 0xSteel
State.Description: Now you can hear zombie footsteps and noises if they aproach you from behind
State.Name: No Silent Zombies (And Animals)

State.Description: This mod allows you to recover 80% of the resources from unwanted ammunition in a very easy straightforward way. Server side friendly.

State.Author: GoblinRemovalist
State.Description: This mod increases the variety, quality, and quantities of items available at Traders.
State.Name: Beefy Trader Inventory by GR

State.Author: napalm1
State.Description: For those that can not get their caffeine fix, coffee machines will now have more coffee related items.

State.Author: FlufferNutterSandwich
State.Description: Cook Snow into Boiled Water at the Campfire with a cooking pot.  Also use Murky Water in crafting Glue, Paint, and Paper.

State.Author: Temreki
State.Description: Makes foul weather less common and decreases horde night fog.

State.Author: Izayo
State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.
State.Name: IZY-All in One Gun Pack v3.1

State.Description: This will increase the amount of water collected to 4 Jars per slot and increase the speed of water collection to 4x when the Gather and Tarp Modifications are installed into the Dew Collector.

State.Description: Improves the spawning of SNOW and BURNT FOREST biomes.

State.Description: A 7 Days to Die (7D2D) mod that adjusts the parameters used in random world generation.

State.Description: Core mod to allow other mods to add opaque paint and grass/plant textures to the atlas. Doesn't do anything on its own, but required by other mods to enable advanced texture features.
State.Name: OCB Custom Textures Core Mod (V1.2)

State.Author: magione
State.Description:
A small mod that adds the option to pick up mines after placing them on the ground or picking up POI mines.



Compatible with 1.0.

Let's you pick up spike traps and barbwire traps



Compatible with 1.0.

State.Description: Takes the Attribute mods and reassigns them to other pieces of armor, logically. Strength, Fortitude and Agility mods can now be placed on Gloves, Outfits and Shoes, respectively. Now all 4 pieces of armor can hold an Attribute mod.

A mod that is meant to have hostiles on the wandering hordes drop a specific type of loot bag with better rewards than before.



Works Server side only and Client side only

State.Name: KHV1 Zombie Reach Adjustment

State.Author: GoblinRemovalist
State.Description: Adds a balanced recipe for a Sprain Healing Kit, because I hate that status ailment.
State.Name: Sprain Healing Kit by GR

State.Author: TheEpicSpire
State.Description: Increases ModSlots on weapons, tools, and armors based on the quality and tier of the item.
State.Name: V1.0 EpicSpire's Quality ModSlot Boost

State.Author: AM1908
State.Description: A custom recipe for a "Toasted Sham Sandwich" and a replacer icon for the "Old Sham Sandwich" so it looks "less" edible.
State.Name: Sham Sandwich

State.Author: Hellgeist
State.Description: This 1.x mod removes the default thermal protections from all Outfits, and increases the severity of extreme temperatures.
State.Name: Weather is Real

State.Author: TheEpicSpire
State.Description: This condenses the tutorial challenge quests down to just 2 instead of 10. Open the challenge menu, redeem and then redeem again, no effort.
State.Name: v1.0 EpicSpire's Quick Start

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: This mod gives each zombie instance a random generated name from a list of over 2000 first names (male and female) and 2000 last names!
State.Name: Random Zombie Names - V1.1 b14

State.Author: Izayo
State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.
State.Name: IZY-All in One Gun Pack v3.1

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: Added several plumbed in water fixtures. Unlike the dew collector these fixtures provide fresh water without waiting, just open the tap and get as much fresh water as you want, in the same way you would do with any modern sink. Craftable in the workbench as a Variant Helper unlocks by workstations skill level (standard version only).
State.Name: Plumbed In Water Solutions

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: Shows the current skill level of books in the description
State.Name: Show Skill Level In Description - V1.1 b14

State.Author: Abrogator
State.Description: Per a request on reddit, this mod adds the ability to install the weighted head mod on bladed weapons like the machete.
State.Name: Weighted Head for Machete (For game version 1.0)

State.Author: Black Wolf
State.Description: Significantly lowers the time needed to scrap or craft certain resources.
State.Name: (A21 and 1.0) Black Wolf's faster resources and ammo scrapping and crafting

State.Author: NikoTine93
State.Description: Add a recipe for the beaker.
State.Name: Craft Beaker

State.Author: moikeeee_
State.Description: Allows you to stack item mods, including dyes
State.Name: Stackable Item Mods

State.Author: Nightmare Moonpie
State.Description: Adds a set of 7 perk books for the Sledgehammers with a completion bonus.
State.Name: Sledgehammer Perk Books

State.Author: Creepers152
State.Description:
This mod allows you to craft every part in the game except for the legendary parts.



Works Server side only and Client side only
State.Name: Crafting Parts

State.Author: phentos
State.Description: This modlet enables accepting multiple trader quests.
State.Name: SimulQuests

State.Author: napalm1
State.Description: You have the chance to obtain jars of Mineral Water and jars of Boiled Water from coolers.
State.Name: Better Water Coolers

State.Author: Stallionsden
State.Description: Sell the kitchen sink, sell your neighbors valuables, maybe even the neighbor to. Sell everything.
State.Name: Stallionsdens Everything is Sellable V1.0

State.Author: Creepers152
State.Description:
This mod allows you to craft those smallEngines because why the heck not.



Works Server side only and Client side only
State.Name: CraftingEngine

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: Tier 5+ quest rewards have a chance to now include a new book that grants the user 1 skill point
State.Name: Skill Point Reward - V1.1 b14

State.Author: ILokhart
State.Description: Inside/Outside and Day/Night world lighting that's been finely tuned to reach the triple point of realism, gameplay balance, and horror survival immersion.
State.Name: World Lighting Tuned 1.0

State.Author: Wolfbain5
State.Description: allows the crossbow to auto reload
State.Name: Crossbow Auto-reload 1.0

State.Author: Khelldon
State.Description: This mod makes all of the Bucks, Chickens, Does, and Rabbits a bit larger.  This is to help the visually impaired and/or those who suck with the bow.
State.Name: FNS Larger Prey Animals

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: Mod that adds a new block that can be placed to indicate a POI is cleared both visually and on the map.
State.Name: POI Cleared Map Marker - V1.1 b14

State.Author: redbeardt
State.Description: The very tiny modlet (it's one line of code really) skips the News/Splash screen new to 1.0 experimental. Requires EAC off.
State.Name: Skip News

State.Author: wolfbain5
State.Description: a kit with the standard stone, wood, grass, and feathers to get you going with.
State.Name: Wolfbain5 Starter kit for 1.0 exp

State.Author: Danzo
State.Description: Adds shadow to all text in the game.
State.Name: 1.0-1.2 Danzo All Text With Shadow

State.Author: BigCat
State.Description: A 《7 Days to Die》 Simple UI.
State.Name: CATUI (for 1.1 stable)

State.Author: Pyrokar
State.Description: This mod adds over 70 new textures for painting.
State.Name: Pyro Paints

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: Workstation smelting timers show total times and not increments
State.Name: Workstation Material Timer - V1.1 b14

State.Author: Dizor
State.Description: When player leaves the quest area this mod displays a return-timer instead of an instant quest failure. EAC should be disabled.
State.Name: Quest Area Timer

State.Author: unvAnnihilator
State.Description: This basic mod will automatically redeem challenges when they become completed.
State.Name: 1.0 Auto Claim Challenges

State.Author: w00kie n00kie
State.Description: New mod that skips the game time to dawn (i.e. 4am)
State.Name: Sleep Until Dawn - V1.1 b14

State.Author: Izayo
State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.
State.Name: IZY-All in One Gun Pack v3.1

State.Author: Sythalin
State.Description: Adds stats to recipe descriptions.
State.Name: Stats in Description

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: Makes the Chainsaw into a weapon of mass destruction when wearing lumberjack set, increasing damage, damage resistance, fuel capacity and attack speed. Tweaked stats to make it as balanced as possible while making the chainsaw powerful and fun to use. Become the king of badassery in the zombie apocalypse!
State.Name: Navezgane Chainsaw Massacre

State.Author: ocbMaurice
State.Description: Automatically stop burning fuel when production or melting is finished
State.Name: OCB Stop Fuel Waste (V1.2)

State.Author: napalm1
State.Description: Upgrades the Repair Tools to be 3x More Powerful, Faster, Stronger and use less Stamina per action.
State.Name: Super Repair Tools

State.Author: Westwud
State.Description:
Enables the player to quickly deposit items from their inventory to nearby containers without the need to open them.

Enables the player to quickly restock items from nearby containers to  their inventory without the need to open them.

EAC must be disabled
State.Name: QuickStack

State.Author: Izayo
State.Description: This mod adds an assortment of new guns, ammo, and weapon animations to 7D2D.
State.Name: IZY-All in One Gun Pack v3.1

State.Author: FlufferNutterSandwich
State.Description: Adds a craftable Electric Bicycle Battery that increases speed while reducing stamina cost.  Also includes hop-higher shocks.
State.Name: FNS Super Rad BMX Vehicle Mods

State.Author: Igor
State.Description:
Small mod reduces the amount of grass, thereby increasing fps a little.

                            (NEW GAME NEEDED)
State.Name: LESS-GRASS

State.Author: FiftyTifty
State.Description: Allows turning lights on/off in the world, and also allows you to modify their settings.
State.Name: Turn Lights On and Off (1.1)

State.Author: ArkangelOfMono
State.Description: Linked Belts Mod originally created by ScottSlade. Huge thanks to Fatrap45 for assistance in updating the mod and getting it working.
State.Name: Linked Belts Updated

State.Author: Double G
State.Description: If you're not feeling Trader Joel's new 1.0 voice, then install this mod and he'll be back to his old grizzly sounding self.
State.Name: OG Trader Joel Voice Lines for V1.0

State.Author: DoubleBlundy
State.Description: Doubles the damage of Hipower ammo making worthwhile to craft
State.Name: OP Hipower ammo V1.0

State.Author: Rumobok
State.Description: Simple mod to allow you to reclaim your storage crates "wood/iron/steel" when harvested.
State.Name: Reclaim Storage Crates

State.Author: jns0fficial
State.Description: MoreQuests (for 7D2D v1.1) aims to add more quests to choose from with all kinds of QoL changes!
State.Name: MoreQuests

Original.Name: TheMeanOnes Return Of Empty Glass Jar ClientSide-6477-1-0-1734316641.7z

State.Author: TheMeanOneMods
State.Description: This simple modlet brings back the Empty glass jar and makes Jars reusable after drinking drinks!
State.Name: TheMeanOnes Return of Empty Glass Jar

State.Author: Elucidus
State.Description: This modlet allows you to convert arrows to crossbow bolts, and vice versa.
State.Name: FNS Transmute Arrows to Bolts

State.Author: FlufferNutterSandwich
State.Description: This modlet adds in recipes for Vitamins and Painkillers to the Chemistry Station.
State.Name: FNS Vitamin and Painkiller Recipe

State.Author: FlufferNutterSandwich
State.Description: Adds many containers as lootable to make the game more immersive.
State.Name: FNS's Loot All the Things

State.Author: 0xSteel
State.Description: Disables some animations that push zombies towards you
State.Name: Disable Glitchy Zombie Animations
